value.title: Meta is expanding its use of AI face scanning to verify users’ age on Facebook Dating
value.excerpt: Facebook is testing ways for people to verify their age when using the platform’s dating app, including using an AI face scanning tool. In a blog post today, Meta announced it would start prompting users on Facebook Dating to verify that they’re over 18 if the platform suspects a user is underage (you must be over 18 to use the dating service).

value.title: Why designing AI for humans requires 'productive discomfort'
value.excerpt: When the consumer version of Google Glass appeared on the scene in 2014, it was heralded as the start of a new era of human-computer ... Just remember Google Glass when you're thinking about what can AI do -- people have to want it."

value.title: Metrics for evaluating an identity verification solution
value.excerpt: Globally, there has been an accelerated shift toward frictionless digital user experiences. value.title: 14 Innovative Ways Agencies Are Leveraging Machine Learning Ad Tools
value.excerpt: Here, members of Forbes Agency Council share impactful ways agencies are leveraging ML advertising tools. Read on to learn about a variety of innovative ways agency pros are using ML to better reach consumers and attract more targeted audiences.

value.title: AWS names 6 key trends driving machine learning innovation and adoption
value.excerpt: From data growth and democratization to industrialization and responsible AI, AWS identified 6 key drivers of machine learning adoption.

value.title: The Future Is Now: Transforming PCB Manufacturing Using Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Manufacturers are exploring ways to increase the efficiencies by which essential electronic components are produced.

value.title: NCSoft leads AI-powered ethical management
value.excerpt: NCSoft, a local video game developer, is accelerating efforts to establish ethical management of artificial intelligence (AI) data, a principle defined by privacy, unbiasedness and transparency, the firm said Wednesday.

value.title: World Cup 2022: Can you outguess our AI predictor robot?
value.excerpt: Al Jazeera’s AI robot has made up for a shaky start and has correctly predicted the outcome of all four knockout games.

value.title: Federated machine learning enables the largest brain tumor study to-date, without sharing patient data
value.excerpt: Researchers at Penn Medicine and Intel Corporation led the largest-to-date global machine learning effort to securely aggregate knowledge from brain scans of 6,314 glioblastoma (GBM) patients at 71 sites around the globe and develop a model that can enhance identification and prediction of boundaries in three tumor sub-compartments,

value.title: Artificial intelligence can be helpful in diabetes monitoring, prevention
value.excerpt: In findings presented at the NeurIPS conference in New Orleans, Klick scientists revealed how they used machine learning and just 12 hours of data from CGMs to determine whether a patient was prediabetic or diabetic.

value.title: Medical studies get tech edge with AI, machine learning, remote care
value.excerpt: New-age technologies like Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) have taken diagnosis, treatment, post-operative care, remote patient care and palliative care to a whole new level. Exp

value.title: Blinken vows US support for Israel despite unease over govt
value.excerpt: The Biden administration will remain a stalwart friend of Israel even as it pursues goals that Prime Minister-elect Benjamin Netanyahu has opposed, the U.S. secretary of state said.

value.title: Researchers develop AI that predicts risk of heart attack with one X-ray
value.excerpt: At such a juncture in time, a trial presented at the Radiological Society of North America (RSNA) has shown that an artificial intelligence has been able to detect the susceptibility of a patient to heart attack and stroke with just one X-ray.

value.title: As chatbot sophistication grows, AI debate intensifies
value.excerpt: California start-up OpenAI has released a chatbot capable of answering a variety of questions, but its impressive performance has reopened the debate on the risks linked to artificial intelligence (AI) technologies.

value.title: 3 ways emotion AI elevates the customer experience
value.excerpt: Emotion AI can boost employees' emotional intelligence and provide real-time support to create better customer experiences.

value.title: Data.ai: Mobile gaming starts to wane after pandemic spike
value.excerpt: Data.ai's latest report shows that mobile games are declining, but the numbers are still higher than they were pre-pandemic.

value.title: Elon Musk says he would put AI brain chip inside one of his children in new disturbing comments
value.excerpt: At the event, the CEO spoke about Neuralink's brain chips' benefits in helping people with disabilities ... To date, the Silicon Valley company has successfully implanted artificial intelligence (AI) microchips in the brains of a macaque and a pig.

value.title: Apple slices its AI image synthesis times in half with new Stable Diffusion fix
value.excerpt: On Wednesday, Apple released optimizations that allow the Stable Diffusion AI image generator to run on Apple Silicon ... SD optimizations can generate a 512×512 50-step image on an M1 chip in 35 seconds. An M2 does the task in 23 seconds, and Apple's ...

value.title: How BMW Group has embraced AI for positive use cases and to improve sustainability | AWS re:Invent
value.excerpt: Among the most exciting use cases is for fully autonomous vehicles, but that’s not the only area where AI is having an impact. For example, Microsoft and Mercedes-Benz are working together to improve automobile production efficiency.

value.title: AI art generator DreamUp illustrates the collision between artistic consent and AI datasets
value.excerpt: Should it be an issue that countless data points of artwork are used to train AI that spits out art in under a minute?

value.title: Google shuts down Duplex on the Web, its attempt to bring AI smarts to retail sites and more
value.excerpt: Google is shutting down Duplex on the Web, its AI-powered set of services that navigated sites to simplify the process of ordering food, purchasing movie tickets and more. According to a note on a Google support page, Google on the Web and any automation features enabled by it will no longer be supported as of this month.

value.title: Nvidia showcases groundbreaking generative AI research at NeurIPS 2022
value.excerpt: Nvidia continues to push boundaries of generative AI in machine learning, self-driving cars, robotics, graphics, simulation and more.

value.title: AWS AI Service Cards signal Amazon’s responsible AI catch-up
value.excerpt: Invent, Amazon launched AI Service Cards, which a Gartner analyst says is an effort to catch up with competitors in responsible AI.

value.title: How Artificial Intelligence Swayed The Midterm Elections - And Will Become A Permanent Feature Of Democracy
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence helped give Democrats a fundraising edge this election season, allowing the blue party to retain control of the Senate and blunt a Republican takeover of the House.

value.title: Uber, Aurora to expand self-driving truck ops in Texas to meet holiday rush
value.excerpt: Dec 2 (Reuters) - Uber Technologies Inc (UBER.N) and self-driving technology company Aurora Innovation Inc (AUR.O) will expand their driverless pilot program in Texas to meet increased delivery demand during the holidays.
